TopicTitle: [WIP] KAP - Kerbin's Age of Pioneers (A Career Mode Overhaul)

Articles.Content: This has actually moved on from being a 'mod pack'. I'm busy replacing the various placeholders with parts that I make myself and once a good set of those is complete I'll be releasing a Module Manager config for Squad's parts only.
Does it work on 0.90? I would also like to know something more about this mod, does it changes any mechanics of the game?

Nothing playable at the moment. Confirming pre-requisite mods and making the MM files for those are still WIP, replacing placeholder parts still WIP, a new tech tree WIP, and a plugin for stuffs I'm not ready to say anything about yet still WIP.

I'm hoping to have a new alpha of KAP ready to go in a couple of weeks. Don't hold me to that.

KAP is similar to Better Than Starting Manned but starts with prop planes and advances 'ages' from there.

This is really cool!

*I will remember Jeb...
PLEASE tell me your going to upgrade this to 1.0 ;_;
Yes!!!!! Whooo! Thank you ash! Thank youuu!!

YES! Just what I needed for KSP: unmanned spacecraft earlier than Manned spacecraft!

This mod will most likely end up being one of my favorites...

I have to say I've really enjoyed these parts.

It would be nice to have a comprehensive tech tree focused on a flight-first progression, including all the available aviation oriented mods (e.g. Firespitter, KAX, RetroFuture, B9, et. al.), but I understand that's beyond your scope for this project. I'd tackle it myself if I had the slightest clue how.

Hello. This mod causes an error while loading the game if Realistic Progression Zero (https://github.com/KSP-RO/RP-0) mod is installed. The details of the error and how to fix it can be found here: https://github.com/KSP-RO/RP-0/issues/204

@AlphaAsh Ummm...so are you still developing this mod?... I ask because you have no download link in the OP, it's an old mod, you show it still as WIP, and there is no mention of compatible KSP version anywhere... However, I see you have it up on KerbalStuff with consistent updates, all the way up to 1.0.5... ??

wouldn't let me install via ckan. 

 

 edit- never mind fixed it

Edited April 15, 2016 by corbett

is this compatible with community or engineering tech tree? 

 

 

edit- yup, it is

Edited April 15, 2016 by corbett

This mod evolved in to a parts pack that I have now discontinued. The last version for KSP 1.0.5 is available on SpaceDock and I have invited voluntary maintenance of the cfgs for KSP updates by someone I trust over in the Add-On Release thread of Rovers & Roadsters.

I may explore original concepts for Kerbin's Age of Pioneers in the future.

Moderators, please lock.
